mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment(board_no, user_no, content, parent_no, seq) VALUES (#{boardNo}, #{userNo}, #{content}, #{parentNo}, #{seq})
mapper.select: SELECT c.no, board_no boardNo, user_no userNo, content, write_date writeDate, parent_no parentNo, seq, u.name userName FROM comment c JOIN users u ON c.user_no = u.no WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
